title: Build a Library System
description: Create a complete library system with books and members
starterCode:
# Create Library system with Book, Member, and Library classes

# Your code here

# Test
library = Library()
book = Book("Python OOP", "John Doe")
member = Member("Alice")
library.add_book(book)
library.register_member(member)
library.borrow_book(member, book)
hints: Book has title, author, and borrowed status
Member has name and list of borrowed books
Track borrowed state to prevent double-borrowing
